channel.title: Command Problems - With no compiler errors?

item.title: Command Problems - With no compiler errors?
item.dc:creator: @GN_Editz GN Editz
item.description:
@GN_Editz wrote:

imsuperman05:

add the c.sidebarinterface.

where?
and how would i format one of the commands?

EDIT: I’m now using these…

} if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("lunar") && c.playerRights == 0) { c.setSidebarInterface(6, 1151); c.playerMagicBook = 0; c.autocastId = -1; c.getPA().resetAutocast(); } if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("ancient") && c.playerRights == 0) { c.setSidebarInterface(6, 12855); c.playerMagicBook = 1; c.autocastId = -1; c.getPA().resetAutocast(); } if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("normal") && c.playerRights == 0) { c.setSidebarInterface(6, 29999); c.playerMagicBook = 2; c.autocastId = -1; c.getPA().resetAutocast(); }

But it still doesnt work.

Read full topic

item.title: Command Problems - With no compiler errors?
item.dc:creator: @GN_Editz GN Editz
item.description:
@GN_Editz wrote:

I’ve started using the following commands to change from each spell book:

} if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("normal") && c.playerRights == 0) { c.playerMagicBook = -1; } if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("lunar") && c.playerRights == 0) { c.playerMagicBook = 0; } if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("ancients") && c.playerRights == 0) { c.playerMagicBook = 1; }

or

} if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("normal") { c.playerMagicBook = -1; } if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("lunar") { c.playerMagicBook = 0; } if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("ancients") { c.playerMagicBook = 1; }

But I either seem to be getting command lag or just no response… Why is this?
(I’ve tried using both ways of formatting)

Read full topic
item.source: Command Problems - With no compiler errors?
